authors.bio:
Hi I'm Matt! I spend my days typing on a keyboard creating things for our favorite 
green robot and battling build time boredom.
authors.name: Matt McKenna

group.title: Android Emulators vs Bluetooth Headphones
group.author: Matt McKenna
group.excerpt: How to Fix Poor Audio Quality When Using Android Emulators

group.title: Learning Live Templates for Jetpack Compose
group.author: Matt McKenna
group.excerpt: What are Live Templates? How can they speed up your development? And how to create your own for Jetpack Compose!

group.title: Adding comments via Utteranc.es
group.author: Matt McKenna
group.excerpt: GitHub Issue powered comments are now available on all posts!

group.title: Newsletter Announcement
group.author: Matt McKenna
group.excerpt: Your weekly dose of bite sized Android news and events delivered Monday mornings to kick off your week.

group.title: Effective Naming of Booleans
group.author: Matt McKenna
group.excerpt: Name your booleans in an effective way that is easy to understand and code review.

group.title: Contributing to the #KotlinPhotoContest
group.author: Matt McKenna
group.excerpt: Recently @mreichelt on Twitter had the great idea to create some free-to-use images of Kotlin for the community. These are my submissions!
